attributes.action: Help the standard of sandwiches improve when made by keegan.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A number of people are unhappy with the way that there sandwiches are filled when buying lunch at Stewarts. Everyone agrees that the standard of sandwiches made by keegan is substandard. It is noted that she is in fact a lovely lady but we the undersigned demand she go on sandwich filling part 1 and 2 immediately.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
